languages.text: Блюстители возвращаются с новой информацией. Корабль перевозил узников на тюремные миры, и связавшийся с мостиком человек был одним из преступников. Заключенные вырвались и разорвали отряд охраняющих их {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}арбитров{/g}, однако в пылу бунта были перебиты ключевые офицеры мостика и контингент техножрецов. Еда на беспомощно дрейфующем судне закончилась или испортилась, и умирающие бунтовщики теперь согласны на все, лишь бы выбраться из своего склепа.

The enforcers return with new information. The ship was transporting convicts to penal worlds, and the man who had contacted the bridge was one of the criminals. The convicts had broken free and massacred the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Arbitrator{/g} squad guarding them; however, in the heat of battle, several crucial bridge officers and a Tech-Priest contingent were killed as well. The ship has been drifting helplessly ever since, and what little food remains has gone bad. The dying rioters would now agree to anything if it helped them get out of their flying crypt.

Еда на беспомощно дрейфующем судне закончилась или испортилась, и умирающие бунтовщики теперь согласны на все, лишь бы выбраться из своего склепа.

traits.locale_text: The enforcers return with new information. The ship turned out to be an Imperium jail, and the man who had contacted the bridge was a prisoner. The convicts had broken free and massacred the Arbitrator squad that guarded them; however, in the heat of battle, critically important bridge officers and a Tech-Priest contingent were killed as well. The ship has been drifting helplessly. What little food remained has gone bad. The dying rioters would now agree to anything if it helps them get out of their flying crypt.

The ship has been drifting helplessly. What little food remained has gone bad. The dying rioters would now agree to anything if it helps them get out of their flying crypt.

The convicts had broken free and massacred the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Arbitrator{/g} squad guarding them; however, in the heat of battle, several crucial bridge officers and a Tech-Priest contingent were killed as well. The ship has been drifting helplessly ever since, and what little food remains has gone bad. The dying rioters would now agree to anything if it helped them get out of their flying crypt.

languages.text: Die Enforcer kehren ohne neue Informationen zurück. Das Schiff hat Sträflinge zu Strafwelten gebracht, und der Mann, der die Brücke kontaktierte, war einer der Kriminellen. Die Sträflinge sind ausgebrochen und haben den zu ihrer Bewachung abgestellten Trupp von {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Arbitratoren{/g} abgeschlachtet. In der Hitze der Schlacht wurden aber auch mehrere wichtige Brückenoffiziere und ein Kontingent von Techpriestern getötet. Seitdem trieb das Schiff hilflos durch das All und die wenigen Lebensmittel an Bord sind längst verdorben. Die sterbenden Aufständischen würden mittlerweile alles tun, um aus ihrer fliegenden Krypta zu entkommen.
languages.original_text: The enforcers return with new information. The ship was transporting convicts to penal worlds, and the man who had contacted the bridge was one of the criminals. The convicts had broken free and massacred the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Arbitrator{/g} squad guarding them; however, in the heat of battle, several crucial bridge officers and a Tech-Priest contingent were killed as well. The ship has been drifting helplessly ever since, and what little food remains has gone bad. The dying rioters would now agree to anything if it helped them get out of their flying crypt.

traits.locale_text: Die Enforcer kehren ohne neue Informationen zurück. Das Schiff hat Sträflinge zu Strafwelten gebracht, und der Mann, der die Brücke kontaktierte, war einer der Kriminellen. Die Sträflinge sind ausgebrochen und haben den zu ihrer Bewachung abgestellten Trupp von {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Arbitratoren{/g} abgeschlachtet. In der Hitze der Schlacht wurden aber auch mehrere wichtige Brückenoffiziere und ein Kontingent von Techpriestern getötet. Seitdem trieb das Schiff hilflos durch das All und die wenigen Lebensmittel an Bord sind längst verdorben. Die sterbenden Aufständischen würden mittlerweile alles tun, um aus ihrer fliegenden Krypta zu entkommen.

Die Enforcer kehren mit neuen Informationen zurück. Das Schiff hat sich als imperiales Gefängnis entpuppt. Der Mann, der die Brücke kontaktiert hat, war ein Gefangener. Die Verurteilten hatten sich befreit und die {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Arbitratoren{/g} getötet, die sie bewachen sollten. Im Eifer des Gefechts wurden jedoch auch mehrere essenzielle Brückenoffiziere und ein Techpriester-Kontingent getötet. Seitdem treibt das Schiff hilflos durch die Leere, und das bisschen Nahrung, das noch übrig war, ist längst verdorben. Die sterbenden Aufständischen würden jetzt in alles einwilligen, wenn es ihnen hilft, aus ihrer fliegenden Krypta zu entkommen.

languages.text: À leur retour, les prévôts vous révèlent ce qu'ils ont appris. Le vaisseau transportait des prisonniers en direction de mondes pénaux, et l'homme qui a contacté la passerelle est l'un des détenus. Les prisonniers ont massacré l'escouade d'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}arbitrators{/g} qui les gardait après s'être évadés de leurs cellules, mais dans le feu de l'action, plusieurs officiers cruciaux et un groupe de technoprêtres ont péri. Depuis, le vaisseau erre dans l'espace et le peu de nourriture qui reste est maintenant gâté. Les émeutiers mourants sont prêts à tout pour que vous les sortiez de leur crypte volante.
languages.original_text: The enforcers return with new information. The ship was transporting convicts to penal worlds, and the man who had contacted the bridge was one of the criminals. The convicts had broken free and massacred the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Arbitrator{/g} squad guarding them; however, in the heat of battle, several crucial bridge officers and a Tech-Priest contingent were killed as well. The ship has been drifting helplessly ever since, and what little food remains has gone bad. The dying rioters would now agree to anything if it helped them get out of their flying crypt.

Depuis, le vaisseau erre dans l'espace et le peu de nourriture qui reste est maintenant gâté. Les émeutiers mourants sont prêts à tout pour que vous les sortiez de leur crypte volante.

À leur retour, les prévôts vous révèlent ce qu'ils ont appris. Le vaisseau est en fait une prison impériale et l'homme qui a contacté la passerelle est l'un des détenus. Les prisonniers ont massacré l'escouade d'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}arbitrators{/g} qui les gardait après s'être évadés de leurs cellules, mais dans le feu de l'action, plusieurs officiers cruciaux ont péri, ainsi qu'un groupe de technoprêtres. Depuis, le vaisseau erre dans l'espace et le peu de nourriture qui reste est maintenant gâté. Les émeutiers mourants sont prêts à faire n'importe quoi pour que vous les sortiez de leur crypte volante.

À leur retour, les prévôts vous révèlent ce qu'ils ont appris. Le vaisseau est en fait une prison impériale et l'homme qui a contacté la passerelle est l'un des détenus. Les prisonniers ont massacré l'escouade d'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}arbitrators{/g} qui les gardait après s'être évadés de leurs cellules, mais dans le feu de l'action, plusieurs officiers cruciaux ont péri, ainsi qu'un groupe de technoprêtres. Les émeutiers mourants sont prêts à faire n'importe quoi pour que vous les sortiez de leur crypte volante.

languages.text: 執行官たちが新たな情報を持って戻ってきた。その船は囚人を流刑惑星へと護送している途中で、ブリッジに連絡してきた男はその囚人の一人だった。囚人たちは逃走し、自分たちを警護していた{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}アービトレイター{/g}部隊を皆殺しにした。しかし戦闘の混乱の中で、数名の重要なブリッジの士官と技術司祭の一団も命を落とした。それ以来その船は無力に漂い続け、わずかに残っていた食料もすでに腐ってしまっている。今や死にかけた暴徒たちは、この空飛ぶ墓場から出られるのなら、どんなことにでも同意するだろう。
languages.original_text: The enforcers return with new information. The ship was transporting convicts to penal worlds, and the man who had contacted the bridge was one of the criminals. The convicts had broken free and massacred the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Arbitrator{/g} squad guarding them; however, in the heat of battle, several crucial bridge officers and a Tech-Priest contingent were killed as well. The ship has been drifting helplessly ever since, and what little food remains has gone bad. The dying rioters would now agree to anything if it helped them get out of their flying crypt.

traits.locale_text: 執行官たちが新たな情報を持って戻ってきた。その船は囚人を流刑惑星へと護送している途中で、ブリッジに連絡してきた男はその囚人の一人だった。囚人たちは逃走し、自分たちを警護していた{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}アービトレイター{/g}部隊を皆殺しにした。しかし戦闘の混乱の中で、数名の重要なブリッジの士官と技術司祭の一団も命を落とした。それ以来その船は無力に漂い続け、わずかに残っていた食料もすでに腐ってしまっている。今や死にかけた暴徒たちは、この空飛ぶ墓場から出られるのなら、どんなことにでも同意するだろう。

執行官たちが新たな情報を持って戻ってきた。その船は帝国の監獄船で、ブリッジに連絡をしてきた男は囚人だったことが判明した。囚人たちは脱走し、自分たちを監視していた{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}アービトレイター{/g}部隊を皆殺しにした。しかし戦闘の混乱の中で、数名の重要なブリッジの士官と技術司祭の一団も命を落とした。それ以来その船は無力に漂い続け、わずかに残っていた食料もすでに腐ってしまっている。今や死にかけた暴徒たちは、この空飛ぶ墓場から出られるのなら、どんなことにでも同意するだろう。

執行官たちが新たな情報を持って戻ってきた。その船は帝国の監獄船で、ブリッジに連絡をしてきた男は囚人だったことが判明した。囚人たちは脱走し、自分たちを監視していた{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}アービトレイター{/g}部隊を皆殺しにした。しかし戦闘の混乱の中で、数名の重要なブリッジの士官と技術司祭の一団も命を落とした。それ以来その船は無力に漂い続け、わずかに残っていた食料もすでに腐ってしまっている。今や死にかけた暴徒たちは、この空飛ぶ墓場から出られるのなら、どんなことにでも同意するだろう。

languages.text: El personal de seguridad vuelve con nueva información. La nave estaba trasladando reclusos a diversos mundos penales, y el hombre que se había puesto en contacto con el puente era uno de los criminales. Los presos se habían fugado y exterminado a la escuadra de {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Arbitrator{/g} que los vigilaba. Sin embargo, durante el fragor de la batalla, varios oficiales esenciales del puente y una unidad de tecnosacerdotes también murieron. La nave lleva a la deriva desde entonces y la poca comida que queda caducó hace tiempo. Los amotinados moribundos aceptarán cualquier cosa con tal de salir de esta cripta volante.
languages.original_text: The enforcers return with new information. The ship was transporting convicts to penal worlds, and the man who had contacted the bridge was one of the criminals. The convicts had broken free and massacred the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Arbitrator{/g} squad guarding them; however, in the heat of battle, several crucial bridge officers and a Tech-Priest contingent were killed as well. The ship has been drifting helplessly ever since, and what little food remains has gone bad. The dying rioters would now agree to anything if it helped them get out of their flying crypt.

Sin embargo, durante el fragor de la batalla, varios oficiales esenciales del puente y una unidad de tecnosacerdotes también murieron. La nave lleva a la deriva desde entonces y la poca comida que queda caducó hace tiempo. Los amotinados moribundos aceptarán cualquier cosa con tal de salir de esta cripta volante.

El personal de seguridad vuelve con nueva información. La nave ha resultado ser una prisión del Imperium, y el hombre que se había puesto en contacto con el puente era un prisionero. Los presos se habían fugado y exterminado a la escuadra de {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Arbitrator{/g} que los vigilaba. Sin embargo, durante el fragor de la batalla, varios oficiales esenciales del puente y una unidad de tecnosacerdotes también murieron. La nave lleva a la deriva desde entonces y la poca comida que queda caducó hace tiempo. Los amotinados moribundos aceptarán cualquier cosa con tal de salir de esta cripta volante».

El personal de seguridad vuelve con nueva información. La nave ha resultado ser una prisión del Imperium, y el hombre que se había puesto en contacto con el puente era un prisionero. Los presos se habían fugado y exterminado a la escuadra de {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Arbitrator{/g} que los vigilaba. Sin embargo, durante el fragor de la batalla, varios oficiales esenciales del puente y una unidad de tecnosacerdotes también murieron. La nave lleva a la deriva desde entonces y la poca comida que queda caducó hace tiempo. Los amotinados moribundos aceptarán cualquier cosa con tal de salir de esta cripta volante».

languages.text: 你的执法者带着新的情报回到了船上。原来，这艘船正在运送帝国的囚犯前往刑罚世界，而刚刚与舰桥联系的人就是其中一名囚犯。那些囚犯越狱了，杀光了负责看守的{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}法务官{/g}小队。然而，在激烈的战斗中，舰桥上几位重要军官与一支技术神甫小队也遭到杀害。在那之后，这艘船就一直在无助地漂流着，仅存的一丁点食物也已经变质了。只要能离开这个飘在空中的棺材，这些奄奄一息的暴徒什么事情都愿意做。
languages.original_text: The enforcers return with new information. The ship was transporting convicts to penal worlds, and the man who had contacted the bridge was one of the criminals. The convicts had broken free and massacred the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Arbitrator{/g} squad guarding them; however, in the heat of battle, several crucial bridge officers and a Tech-Priest contingent were killed as well. The ship has been drifting helplessly ever since, and what little food remains has gone bad. The dying rioters would now agree to anything if it helped them get out of their flying crypt.

languages.text: İnfazcılar, gemiden dönüp bilgi veriyor. Geminin ceza dünyalarına suçlu taşıdığı, köprüyle iletişime geçen adamın da suçlulardan biri olduğu ortaya çıkıyor. Mahkûmlar isyan edip başlarındaki {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Yargıcı{/g} mangasını katletmiş. Fakat savaşın hararetiyle birkaç önemli köprü subayı ile bir Tekno Rahip birliği de arada kaynamış. Gemi, o zamandan beri çaresizce sürükleniyormuş ve geriye kalan az miktarda yiyecek de bozulmuş. Ölüm döşeğindeki mahkûmlar, uçan mahzenlerinden kurtulmak için her şeye razı.
languages.original_text: The enforcers return with new information. The ship was transporting convicts to penal worlds, and the man who had contacted the bridge was one of the criminals. The convicts had broken free and massacred the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Arbitrator{/g} squad guarding them; however, in the heat of battle, several crucial bridge officers and a Tech-Priest contingent were killed as well. The ship has been drifting helplessly ever since, and what little food remains has gone bad. The dying rioters would now agree to anything if it helped them get out of their flying crypt.

Mahkûmlar isyan edip başlarındaki {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Yargıcı{/g} mangasını katletmiş. Fakat savaşın hararetiyle birkaç önemli köprü subayı ile bir Tekno Rahip birliği de arada kaynamış. Gemi, o zamandan beri çaresizce sürükleniyormuş ve geriye kalan az miktarda yiyecek de bozulmuş. Ölüm döşeğindeki mahkûmlar, uçan mahzenlerinden kurtulmak için her şeye razı.

İnfazcılar, dönüp bilgi veriyor. Geminin bir İmparatorluk hapishanesi olduğu, köprüyle iletişime geçen adamın bir mahkûm olduğu ortaya çıkıyor. Mahkûmlar isyan edip başlarındaki {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Yargıcı{/g} mangasını katletmişler. Fakat savaşın hararetiyle birkaç önemli köprü subayı ile bir Tekno Rahip birliği de arada kaynamış. Gemi, o zamandan beri çaresizce sürükleniyormuş ve geriye kalan az miktarda yiyecek de bozulmuş. Ölüm döşeğindeki mahkûmlar, uçan mahzenlerinden kurtulmak için her şeye razılar.

İnfazcılar, dönüp bilgi veriyor. Geminin bir İmparatorluk hapishanesi olduğu, köprüyle iletişime geçen adamın bir mahkûm olduğu ortaya çıkıyor. Mahkûmlar isyan edip başlarındaki {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Yargıcı{/g} mangasını katletmişler. Fakat savaşın hararetiyle birkaç önemli köprü subayı ile bir Tekno Rahip birliği de arada kaynamış. Gemi, o zamandan beri çaresizce sürükleniyormuş ve geriye kalan az miktarda yiyecek de bozulmuş. Ölüm döşeğindeki mahkûmlar, uçan mahzenlerinden kurtulmak için her şeye razılar.
